formalText: It's just she keeps getting these situations where her heart starts to really really race.
Like boom.
Boom, she gets chest pain.
She can't catch her breath.
It's making her feel feel funny talking about it.
Her heart starts to race.
She can't get her breath and then she gets chest pains and she gets very afraid.
She's going to have a heart attack.
Just talking about it,
she can feel it starting to come up.
She thinks it's probably been about six months.
She's felt more stress about work than she normally does and basically, she was just trying to get into town one day on an off day and it was very hot.
It just happened. Her heart started to race and race and race and she couldn't get her breath.
She was just like gasping for breath.
Then she started to get chest pains and it was just awful, and she managed to sit down and call her husband and he came out.
It was awful. It really was really really frightening.
She thought she was having a heart attack.
She is only 25.
Each time
it happens,
she's so afraid that that is what's happening.
She started to try and avoid situations where she might get like that basically.
She can't get into town now without her husband taking her because her husband has to take her to and from work, and she also thought she shouldn't do anything to put any strain on her heart at all.
So she doesn't do much exercise or anything at the moment and other things as well.
She just feels that she shouldn't do anything like that because it might put too much strain on her.
So she's avoiding sex in case that it puts her heart rate up.
She doesn't go out to town by herself.
She doesn't want to risk it to be honest.
She hasn't got a bad heart according to the experts, but she's still getting all the symptoms and they're getting worse and worse.
She's started to really monitor her heart and when it starts to race she starts to get worried and then it starts getting faster and faster.
She was told that it was okay and there was no problems and she did feel relief because obviously there has been heart attacks in her family.
Her dad died of one at 72, so she's thinking it must be her heart.
